entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:49 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
